collection.name: Mobile image
collection.description: This picture will be added only for mobile views.

page.name: Team members
page.description: This is a practice metafield for team members.

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Watch display
product.description: Distinguishes between watch displays, such as digital or analog

product.name: Watch features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of a watch, such as automatic movement or luminous hands

product.name: Band color
product.description: Specifies the color of a watch band, e.g. multicolor, rose gold

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Flavor
product.description: Specifies the taste or flavor of a product, e.g. vanilla, mint

product.name: Allergen information
product.description: Indicates potential allergens present in food or beverages, such as wheat or peanuts

product.name: Chocolate type
product.description: Defines the variety of chocolate based on its ingredients and cocoa content, e.g. dark chocolate, milk chocolate

product.name: Nut processing method
product.description: Defines how nuts or seeds are prepared, e.g. candied, raw

product.name: Nut/Seed type
product.description: Identifies the specific type of nut or seed in a product, such as almonds or chia seeds

product.name: Care Instructions
product.description: Details on how to care for the item.

product.name: Neckline
product.description: Used to describe the neck shape of a garment, such as V-neck or boat

product.name: Jewelry type
product.description: Distinguishes between types of jewelry, such as fine or imitation jewelry

product.name: Ring size
product.description: Specifies the size of a ring, such as L or 6.5

product.name: Jewelry material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in jewelry items, such as gold or enamel

product.name: Ring design
product.description: Describes the style of a ring, such as band or solitaire

product.name: Key benefits
product.description: Benefits of using this.

product.name: Ingredients
product.description: Ingredients used for this.

product.name: SKU
product.description: Custom SKUs for specific product.

product.name: Child products
product.description: Child products for the parent product.

product.name: Fit
product.description: Describes the fit of a garment, typically pant shape; e.g. skinny leg, wide

product.name: Waist rise
product.description: Indicates where on the waist a garment sits, like low, medium or high

product.name: Pants length type
product.description: Used to defines the length of pants, such as cropped or long

product.name: Clothing features
product.description: Describes unique properties of apparel, such as water resistant or wrinkle resistant

variant.name: Scratch card
variant.description: One should for showing off and another should for coupon code
